timeline.bodyText: Shall we remove the method also?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
In JKube it's only used in DockerAssemblyManager.
I didn't want to remove it because it's part of the public API, but anyway, I don't think anyone is using JKube-kit besides ourselves, so I'll remove.
replies.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: Could you please void wildcard imports?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia
